about_the_game:
Greak: Memories of Azur Digital Artbook is 73 pages of hand drawn artwork collected together to exhibit the characters and world of Greak: Memories of Azur.

The Digital ArtBook will be placed in the same folder as the game at "Steam\steamapps\common\Greak Memories of Azur"

You will be able to access the folder by pressing RightClick on the game icon on Steam -> Properties-> Local Files -> Browse

It should be a .PDF File named "Greak - Memories of Azur (Digital ArtBook)"
detailed_description:
Greak: Memories of Azur Digital Artbook is 73 pages of hand drawn artwork collected together to exhibit the characters and world of Greak: Memories of Azur.

The Digital ArtBook will be placed in the same folder as the game at "Steam\steamapps\common\Greak Memories of Azur"

You will be able to access the folder by pressing RightClick on the game icon on Steam -> Properties-> Local Files -> Browse

It should be a .PDF File named "Greak - Memories of Azur (Digital ArtBook)"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT, 512 GB or AMD Radeon HD 6570, 1 GB
  • Storage: 127 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GTX, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5750, 1 GB
  • Storage: 127 MB available space
